RemediationStrings.Title: Windows Defender was not detected.
RemediationStrings.Description: You must have Windows Defender installed on your device to protect it from malware.

RemediationStrings.Title: Security Provider not recognized.
RemediationStrings.Description: The security provider is not recognized by the system. Please ensure it is properly configured.

RemediationStrings.Title: Windows Defender real time protection is not enabled
RemediationStrings.Description: Real time protection must be enabled in Windows Defender to protect your device, please enable this setting.

RemediationStrings.Title: Windows Defender definitions are not up to date.
RemediationStrings.Description: Please update the Windows Defender definitions to ensure your device is protected from malware.
